content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I play the role of Peter Schmidt in this scenario, let us focus on negotiating the rental price for the imagined apartment here in our discussion. To begin with, I believe this prime location and luxurious setup warrant a competitive price. How does around 1200 Euro per month sound to you as a starting point?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial proposal, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering my circumstances as a student with a strong emphasis on affordability and responsibility, I find 1200 Euro per month a bit high for this newly built, but unfurnished apartment in the city center. With my dependable nature, I am confident I would maintain the apartment well, but I would like to explore lower options first. Could we consider negotiating closer to 1050 Euro or perhaps even slightly less?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your interest in the apartment, Yi-Nuo Wang, but as a landlord, I must protect my investment's value. Reducing the rent to 1050 Euro would not align with my initial expectations. However, to accommodate your circumstances a bit, I'm willing to lower it to 1150 Euro per month if we can come to an agreement swiftly. Are you open to considering this revised figure?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, while I understand your concerns as a landlord, the proposed price of 1150 Euro still seems substantial for an unfurnished apartment in this location. Given my strong commitment to responsibility and my excellent academic record, I believe my credentials could merit a lower rent as a form of recognition of my trustworthiness. However, I understand your need for a reasonable return on investment. If you are unable to lower the rent further at this time, I will need to give careful thought before accepting this offer, but please know my top priority remains finding an affordable option.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, your dedication to academic excellence and responsible behavior are certainly commendable, and I acknowledge your search for an affordable option. Unfortunately, in this highly competitive real estate market, I find it challenging to lower the rent any further without compromising my own financial well-being. If you decide to proceed with the 1150 Euro offer, I trust that you'll maintain the apartment to a high standard, which could potentially lead to a positive reference when you seek future accommodations. However, if you need more time to consider or explore other options, I understand your predicament and wish you the best of luck in your search. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
